subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Matz had four runs batted in in his record-setting Mets debut, but the single-game R.B.I. king for pitchers remains Tony Cloninger, with nine in 1966 for the Braves.
snippet: Matz had four runs batted in in his record-setting Mets debut, but the single-game R.B.I. king for pitchers remains Tony Cloninger, with nine in 1966 for the Braves.
